website_summaries.verdict: One of the only options for rain protection for extra-large strollers.
pros: Heavy fabric does a good job of keeping the rain out of larger and double strollers
Fasteners also make the cover good for wind protection
Convenient access on both sides of the cover
cons: A lot of excess hangs from the bottom of some strollers

customer_reviews.title: Well made and versatile
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this to try on our Baby Trend Navigator (double jogger) stroller as there are not any rain covers made specifically for our stroller. This cover is well made, that’s for sure. The design is versatile enough to allow us to keep our kids dry. I will add pics so your can make your own desicipn if you are trying to use this for a stroller other than the britax.
customer_reviews.author: sophicwife

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: This has been a lifesaver more than a few times now- it fits the britax b agile perfectly. It sat in the pouring rain for an hour and a half at Disneyland last week and all of our stuff, including our kids, stayed dry. It has also walked across the Golden Gate Bridge with wind and rain successfully. This rain cover also fits our jogging stroller extremely well (it's a mountain buggy double jogger). It won't fit every stroller, obviously, but if you have a b agile double, it's definitely great to have!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew and Andrea

customer_reviews.title: I was pleasantly surprised that this cover fits the double ...
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised that this cover fits the double city mini stroller perfectly. The cover looks classy and durable
customer_reviews.author: v chaba

customer_reviews.title: Works with ZOE Double!
customer_reviews.text: We used this on our Zoe double stroller in Disney (July 2018) and it worked amazing! I am not a fan of the all plastic rain covers that Zoe sells because they are difficult to fold up once wet; this cover was easy to fold up and kept my kids dry! Their feet did dangle out, but we had them tuck their feet in (or took their shoes off because it was 100 degrees and the rain felt nice).
customer_reviews.author: Book Girl

customer_reviews.title: There is also velcro located on either side so that you may have easy access to your children
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for our Graco FastAction Fold Duo Click Connect Stroller and it's, by far, the largest stroller cover I've been able to find. While it still doesn't cover the area where their feet would be exposed, my little ones will be a lot more covered than they were with Jeep rain cover I purchased from here last year. As other reviewers noted, the cover sent is not the same as the one pictured, but a gray material with a transparent window for the kids to see out of with ventilation holes on the sides. There is also velcro located on either side so that you may have easy access to your children.
customer_reviews.author: Mandi Howard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits over my Joovey x2 perfectly. Keeps the wind and rain of the little ones.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Excellent item
customer_reviews.text: I have a joovy double scooter x2 and it fits great. The ties and hooks on the bottom only work on one side but it covers my stroller nicely.
customer_reviews.author: LexaniJ

customer_reviews.title: This rain cover is amazing! It so helpful and easy to connect on ...
customer_reviews.text: This rain cover is amazing! It so helpful and easy to connect on the stroller. I love this cover ! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Yuris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Kept the little ones dry even during torrential down pours!
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel Miller

customer_reviews.title: Works great on bumbleride indie twin!
customer_reviews.text: This was a lifesaver on our trip to Disneyland! So glad I purchased it. Much easier to throw on than a universal cover I tried. Very quick to put on, holds shape, kids didn't mind it! Even kept everything under in the cargo basket dry!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Moore

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend this product and material dries quickly
customer_reviews.text: This stroller cover fit perfectly over our Britax Double side by side stroller. Would definitely recommend this product and material dries quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Fits joovy x2 perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Love this!! It perfectly fits my Joovy x2 stroller. The kids love it. We have been able to take our kids for several walks in cold/windy weather and they stayed nice and warm.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Great quality cover for double strollers!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality rain cover for double strollers! I have it on our B-Agile Double and it fit like a glove! I appreciate the easy Velcro strips for positioning it on and off!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE EVERYTHING ABOUT THIS COVER LOVE LOVE LOVE ...
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE EVERYTHING ABOUT THIS COVER LOVE LOVE LOVE EERYTHING ABOUT THIS RINCOVER AND STROLLER Britax B-Agile Double Stroller Rain Cover ... Britax
customer_reviews.author: LINI

customer_reviews.title: This suits my stroller and easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: A raincover is absolutely a must if you live in Seattle. This suits my stroller and easy to put on. It covers everything and protects very well with no leaking. The only con is that when you fix it to front wheels and if your kid moves his legs he can tear the plastic part off from the fabric seam and there will be a hole.
customer_reviews.author: Jaelle

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: I returned this. I bought this to cover my doggy stroller, not even close
customer_reviews.author: Denise Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't match photo
customer_reviews.text: The rain cover that was sent does not match the photo. I wanted a transparent cover but what I received is a dull gray opaque cover except for a small transparent window in the front.
customer_reviews.author: Enkidu

customer_reviews.title: Second choice ended up being the best!
customer_reviews.text: After researching for many months we decided to go with the BOB jogging stroller. It arrived and we hated it! It was very bulky and hard to close. We sent it back and went with our second choice which was the Britax b-agile. We absolutely love it. We used the infant seat adapters for a while but now my six month old and two year old sit side by side happily. It folds easily and fits nicely in my trunk. We took it to disney a month ago and it was easy to take on and off the bus and my 7 and 1/2 year old even say in it when he got tired. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Great, but ...
customer_reviews.text: The stroller works great. My only complaint is that it only takes one car seat. This is surprising and disappointing since when you buy a double equipment you would expect it to harbor the same feature twice.
customer_reviews.author: Alioune

customer_reviews.title: The velcro is very thin and opens with any slight ...
customer_reviews.text: The velcro is very thin and opens with any slight pulling. Also, I read that this fits the baby jogger summit x3 double. It most certainly does not. Wrong shape and not big enough.
customer_reviews.author: A. James

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for my valco baby snap duo stroller
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. Perfect fit for my Valco snap duo stroller. I knew I didn't want the all plastic rain cover as I had them before and they were much harder to fold because it kept sticking to itself. Plus I feel it wasn't breathable and my kids got hot and stuffy inside, even with air holes. I feel this one will breath much better and keep my kids comfortable. Bonus is that this folds very easily without fighting with all the plastic. I'll update as soon as I'm able to test it out in the rain.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

product_meta.title: Britax B-Agile Double Stroller Wind and Rain Cover
product_meta.description:
The B-AGILE Double Rain Cover provides complete protection for your children in wind and rain. This rain cover is custom designed to fit over the canopies of both seats and is easily secured using hook and loop attachments. The rain cover is designed with openings on both sides so you can access one child at a time while the other seat remains covered.

BRAND STORY
By Britax
feature_bullets: Cover provides complete protection for your child against wind and rain elements
Openings on both sides to access one child at a time while the other seat remains covered
Easily secured to the stroller using the hook and loop attachments
Compatible with Britax B-Agile Double Strollers
Dimensions 40” L x 30.5” W x 41.4” H

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.4 out of 5 stars34 ratings3.4 out of 5 stars
